According to web search results, there were no substantial corporate developments or business updates for TITAN Ltd published on August 24, 2025 .

A search of corporate announcements found that on August 24, 2025, TITAN Ltd informed the stock exchange of the appointment of Mr. Puneet Chhatwal as a Non-Executive Director, effective August 28, 2025. While a corporate appointment is a business update, it does not represent a substantial corporate development in the context of major strategic shifts, acquisitions, or product launches.
